text: Unacceptable! 😡🇷🇺 Russia's senseless war in Ukraine must end NOW! 🕰️ Chancellor Olaf Scholz rightly urged China's Xi Jinping to pressure Putin 🇷🇺 to withdraw troops & cease the violence. 💔 The world can't stand idly by as innocent lives are lost. 💪 Let's keep pushing for peace & diplomacy! 🕊️
